issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Windows

### AdGuard version

7.15 (4385)

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome, Microsoft Edge

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.tripcentral.ca/

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter

### Social Widgets

AdGuard Social Media filter

### Annoyances

AdGuard Annoyances filter, Adblock Warning Removal List

### Security

_No response_

### Other

Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

AdGuard French filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Hide your search queries, Send Do-Not-Track signals, Self-destruction of third-party cookies, Disable cache for third-party requests, Block Location API, Hide Referrer from third-parties (specify in comment below, if used custom value), Mask your IP address (specify in comment below, if used custom value), Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests, Protect from DPI

### Add your comment and screenshots

The site won’t load when “Protect from DPI” in Stealth Mode is enabled. The error message is:

> This site can’t be reached
> www.tripcentral.ca unexpectedly closed the connection.
> ERR_CONNECTION_CLOSED
> 

This site loads normally when “Protect from DPI” is disabled.

### Add your comment and screenshots

Steps to reproduce the problem:
1. Go to this URL: https://www.tangerine.ca/en
2. Click on the “Log Me In” button
3. Enter “123” in the “Login ID” textbox, then click on the “Next” button

When accessing the website for the first time within 24 hours, the page asking for the PIN doesn’t load. If we start over again from step 1, then the page asking for the PIN loads and the website works fine.

### Issue URL (Social Widget) [https://www.youtube.com/@tunetankmusic/about](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2F%40tunetankmusic%2Fabout) ### Comment > I used AdGuard on Chromium, Brave, and Firefox. comment.body:
Added another rule that should help, but this is not reproduced on my end. Check that the AdGuard is really working there by clicking on the address bar.
Also try to clear browser data, update the filters (wait almost one minute there) in 2-3 hours, open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

comment.body:
NEW ISSUE UPDATE:
when I clicked the get link button, I was not directed to https://pastelink.net/f40a49q9 as in the image below
![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/37255346/6446a071-ff56-45a4-9f0a-4ef05ed56353)

but when I click the get link button, what happens is the link changes to https://mylinks.id/afflaz2/random.php which is directed to an e-commerce advertisement
![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/37255346/3f4af607-8eff-4a23-b7aa-6f1c94850baa)

This makes me have to manually right click the mouse and open a new tab to be able to go to https://pastelink.net/f40a49q9 which is the actual destination link for this shortlink page

AdGuard for Windows

7.15 (4385)

Chrome, Microsoft Edge

Desktop

AdGuard Base filter

Hide your search queries, Send Do-Not-Track signals, Self-destruction of third-party cookies, Disable cache for third-party requests, Block Location API, Hide Referrer from third-parties (specify in comment below, if used custom value), Mask your IP address (specify in comment below, if used custom value), Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests, Protect from DPI

> 

This site loads normally when “Protect from DPI” is disabled.

comment.body:
Fixed, update should be available in 2-3 hours.
After that time, you should clear browser data, update the filters (wait almost one minute there), open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

comment.body:
Advanced Protection enables ability to use advanced rules, like JavaScript or CSS rules - https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-ios/overview/#advanced-protection

In theory something like this:
```adblock
example.com#%#(()=>{const e=new URL(location.href);e.searchParams.get("ref")&&(e.searchParams.delete("ref"),location.replace(e))})();
```
could be used to remove `ref` parameter (it removes `ref` parameter from the URL and redirects to website without it, so website might loads twice).
It requires advanced protection enabled and then adding rule to user rules.

### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://mail.yahoo.com/d/folders/1/messages/AFmigFMVJb6iZTUERwaTmKmY8hQ?_intl=ca&_lang=en-CA&pspid=1197793611&activity=ybar-mail](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmail.yahoo.com%2Fd%2Ffolders%2F1%2Fmessages%2FAFmigFMVJb6iZTUERwaTmKmY8hQ%3F_intl%3Dca%26_lang%3Den-CA%26pspid%3D1197793611%26activity%3Dybar-mail) ### Comment > I have made absolutely NO changes to my computer or to my Adguard extension settings yet suddenly, when Adguard is enabled, my Yahoo account has no contacts listed. When composing a message there are no contact suggestions and I am unable to search emails. I reported this issue to Adguard and was told it was a filtering issue that was resolved and I was once again able to see these things while Adguard was enabled however after a short time the issue came back. I am not able to use Yahoo mail with Adguard enabled. > > I'm not very skilled with coding etc. so hopefully I understand any help I receive. Username: @mee1emeeshgmail.com ### Screenshots

### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Windows

### AdGuard version

7.15 (4385)

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome, Microsoft Edge

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.tripcentral.ca/

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter

### Social Widgets

AdGuard Social Media filter

### Annoyances

AdGuard Annoyances filter, Adblock Warning Removal List

### Security

_No response_

### Other

Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

AdGuard French filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Hide your search queries, Send Do-Not-Track signals, Self-destruction of third-party cookies, Disable cache for third-party requests, Block Location API, Hide Referrer from third-parties (specify in comment below, if used custom value), Mask your IP address (specify in comment below, if used custom value), Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests, Protect from DPI

### Add your comment and screenshots

The site won’t load when “Protect from DPI” in Stealth Mode is enabled. The error message is:

> This site can’t be reached
> www.tripcentral.ca unexpectedly closed the connection.
> ERR_CONNECTION_CLOSED
> 

This site loads normally when “Protect from DPI” is disabled.

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
I’ve sent the AdGuard configuration file to the email address you provided. I also tested the website using Incognito mode in Chrome and received this error message:

> Bad Request
> Your browser sent a request that this server could not understand.

This might be due to the Advanced Settings I use. I’ll have to test this later.

went away.

comment.body:
Only have a gmx.net account and there i do not see an ad after changing (maybe I have to wait 48h as they state).

On gmx.net they hide their e-mails in two shadow-roots.

Please try this rule:

`3c-bap.gmx.ch,3c-bap.gmx.at,3c-bap.gmx.net,3c-bap.web.de#%#//scriptlet('hide-in-shadow-dom', 'list-inbox-pga-ad-item')`

If not working, please try this rule:
`3c-bap.gmx.ch,3c-bap.gmx.at,3c-bap.gmx.net,3c-bap.web.de#%#//scriptlet('inject-css-in-shadow-dom','list-inbox-pga-ad-item { display: none !important; }')`

issue.title: wallstmemes.com

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites - [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml); - [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue; - [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date; - [X] Browser version is up-to-date; - [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue. ### What product do you use? AdGuard for Windows ### AdGuard version 7.15 (4385) ### What type of problem have you encountered? Website or app doesn't work properly ### Which browser(s) do you use? Chrome, Microsoft Edge ### Which device do you use? Desktop ### Where is the problem encountered? https://token.wallstmemes.com/en#staking ### Ad Blocking AdGuard Base filter ### Privacy AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter ### Social Widgets AdGuard Social Media filter ### Annoyances AdGuard Annoyances filter, Adblock Warning Removal List ### Security _No response_ ### Other Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion ### DNS filters _No response_ ### Language-specific AdGuard French filter ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? Hide your search queries, Send Do-Not-Track signals, Self-destruction of third-party cookies, Disable cache for third-party requests, Block Location API, Hide Referrer from third-parties (specify in comment below, if used custom value), Mask your IP address (specify in comment below, if used custom value), Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests, Protect from DPI ### Add your comment and screenshots Problem: When connecting to the MetaMask wallet to view the tokens, the webpage does not load correctly. The token count always displays as 0 when the “Hide your Referer from third parties” stealth option is selected. There is no need to have any tokens to see when the problem is resolved. Instead, we can look at the top of the page. The section above the “Buy on Uniswap” button displays a refresh animation instead of showing text. The HTML code for this part is: `

Buy and stake $WSM now!

Stake $WSM now to earn rewards. Staked tokens can be withdrawn after 7 days since you last updated your stake. Use 0xB62E45c3Df611dcE236A6Ddc7A493d79F9DFadEf to add $WSM to your wallet
Your staked WSM = 0
Your stakeable WSM = 0
` I fixed the problem by adding this custom rule: `@@||convincing-prettiest-firefly.quiknode.pro^$domain=token.wallstmemes.com,third-party` Steps to reproduce the problem: 1. Install the MetaMask Chrome extension and create an account (this only takes a few seconds). 2. Visit the webpage https://token.wallstmemes.com/en#staking 3. Select the MetaMask wallet ### Privacy - [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: wallstmemes.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites - [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml); - [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue; - [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date; - [X] Browser version is up-to-date; - [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue. ### What product do you use? AdGuard for Windows ### AdGuard version 7.15 (4385) ### What type of problem have you encountered? Website or app doesn't work properly ### Which browser(s) do you use? Chrome, Microsoft Edge ### Which device do you use? Desktop ### Where is the problem encountered? https://token.wallstmemes.com/en#staking ### Ad Blocking AdGuard Base filter ### Privacy AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter ### Social Widgets AdGuard Social Media filter ### Annoyances AdGuard Annoyances filter, Adblock Warning Removal List ### Security _No response_ ### Other Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion ### DNS filters _No response_ ### Language-specific AdGuard French filter ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? Hide your search queries, Send Do-Not-Track signals, Self-destruction of third-party cookies, Disable cache for third-party requests, Block Location API, Hide Referrer from third-parties (specify in comment below, if used custom value), Mask your IP address (specify in comment below, if used custom value), Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests, Protect from DPI ### Add your comment and screenshots Problem: When connecting to the MetaMask wallet to view the tokens, the webpage does not load correctly. The token count always displays as 0 when the “Hide your Referer from third parties” stealth option is selected. There is no need to have any tokens to see when the problem is resolved. Instead, we can look at the top of the page. The section above the “Buy on Uniswap” button displays a refresh animation instead of showing text. The HTML code for this part is: `

Buy and stake $WSM now!

Stake $WSM now to earn rewards. Staked tokens can be withdrawn after 7 days since you last updated your stake. Use 0xB62E45c3Df611dcE236A6Ddc7A493d79F9DFadEf to add $WSM to your wallet
Your staked WSM = 0
Your stakeable WSM = 0
` I fixed the problem by adding this custom rule: `@@||convincing-prettiest-firefly.quiknode.pro^$domain=token.wallstmemes.com,third-party` Steps to reproduce the problem: 1. Install the MetaMask Chrome extension and create an account (this only takes a few seconds). 2. Visit the webpage https://token.wallstmemes.com/en#staking 3. Select the MetaMask wallet ### Privacy - [X] I agree to follow this condition

Steps to reproduce the problem:

comment.body:
When I open iframe, I get `https://3c.web.de/mail/client/home;jsessionid=`

So after chaning to `3c.web.de#%#//scriptlet('hide-in-shadow-dom', 'list-inbox-pga-ad-item')` the Ad is gone. **But** when I dsiable rule and reload page, the Ad is still gone. Also after clearing Cooke/Cache, I can't reproduce the Ad anymore. The closing might got stored in my profile.
